# Lambda

warden

OG Warden

Available for Hire

Security Researcher and Developer with over 8 years of experience that
transitioned from traditional finance to the blockchain space. Over 40
completed audits (and penetration tests of off-chain components like wallets)
in various settings with more than 600 findings and over 140 C4 high and
medium findings with 17 top 5 rankings in roughly 4 months. Academic
background in Data Science / Mathematical Finance and High-Performance
Computing with multiple
[publications](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=Qw45ZYwAAAAJ).
Started solving CTFs as a small child and has not stopped since then, member
of the 2016 Swiss national CTF team at the European cyber security
championship.

## Highlights

  * [40+ completed audits and penetration tests](https://github.com/OpenCoreCH/smart-contract-audits)

In these audits, I found 600+ findings, which included 140+ high and medium
severity findings on Code4rena.

## Lambda's Activity

The Activity Stream is currently in beta. [Share feedback here](/help).

## Available for hire

[Get a quote](https://code4rena.typeform.com/solo-
audit#warden=Lambda&source=Lambda-profile)

## About

Lambda is a Security Researcher and Developer with multiple years of
experience in IT security and traditional finance. His academic background is
in Data Science, Mathematical Finance, and High-Performance Computing.

  * [Trust Security Profile](https://www.trust-security.xyz/team/lambda)
